Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, directly west of the Millwood Mayor's Office.
Room.LongDescription: The Millwood Memorial Mayor's Office is the seat of power for most of the domestic affairs with regards to the city. Of course, Lyanden Castle is the real center of power for the City of Oceancrest, but the mayor's job is to keep the peace and provide for domestic tranquility. Rosecrest Street takes a turn towards the northeast as it approaches Nylandian Bay.
